content.rendered:
A light, refreshing Aloe Vera-based moisturiser that works to soothe and calm sebaceous (oil) activity. Plant-based botanicals including CO2 extracts of Calendula and CoEnzyme Q10 for antioxidant protection are blended with bioactive native extracts of Kakadu Plum, Finger Lime Caviar and Aniseed Myrtle to tone and balance blemish prone skin.

Suitable for combination, oily and acne-prone skin.

excerpt.rendered:
• Balances sebaceous activity whilst offering hydration
  • Calm and soothe skin that is inflamed
  • Ideal for soothing the skin after sun and exposure to elements
  • A lightweight moisturiser for post-shaving
